page.title: 11Clubs in Dumfries
page.content: The{"Cue Ball"} is Dumfries's latest leisure centre and is situated above the Presto Supermarket on the Southergate area of the High.St. It was opened for public use on the fourteenth of January 1985. Officially it was opened by Steve Davis on the 24th. It offers a wide range of modern facilities for ordinary families in Dumfries.They have a large, well accommodated lounge with a well equipped bar, restaurant, darts boards and a small disco area. The snooker room is very spacious with nineteen full sized snooker tables and two pool tables. There is a creche for small children with a video, T.V., electronic games, and toys.There is a well equipped, modern gym with weights, body building machines etc. There is also a sauna, sunbeds and a jacuzzi.
